Name: Metal Mars
About the game: Metal Mars is a real time strategy game where you race to gather resources and build on mars! This game can be played locally with a shared screen with up to three friends (4 players total). There are also 30 challenges to complete against the CPU! For the best experience, plug in an Xbox controller. If you don't have one, the game will revert to keyboard controls. You must have one controller for each player in order to enjoy local multiplayer.
Meta Title: Metal Mars: May 3, 2021, 2 Barrel Arts and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Metal Mars? Check out the release date (May 3, 2021), developer insights from 2 Barrel Arts, and a complete game summary.
